channel.title: RSS Feed for Zany Hovel: Bholenath Valsan's Personal Website
channel.description: I update the content of this website every weekend.

item.title: Manifesto | Valsan's Zany Hovel
item.description: This is a non-political manifesto about using the web. I like the concept of the indy web, but I don't subscribe to its assertive and combative stance.

item.title: About Zany Hovel | Valsan's Zany Hovel
item.description: Story of Zany Hovel and technical specs. In this page you will find a detailed account of how this website came into being.

item.title: Bholenath's Picks and Links | Valsan's Zany Hovel
item.description: On this page, you will find links to odd places on the interwebs that I consider worthy of sharing with others. All links open in a new browser tab.

item.title: Zany Hovel's Guestbook | Valsan's Zany Hovel
item.description: In the best tradition of personal static websites, here is a guestbook where you can express your feelings and thoughts...

item.title: Bholenath's Social Media Profiles | Valsan's Zany Hovel
item.description: On this page I have listed all the social media websites in which I have profiles. Please add me as a friend, I don't bite.

item.title: Bholenath's Work | Valsan's Zany Hovel
item.description: My work ethic is this: do what I like, but never be satisfied, in both work conditions and compensation, thus always improve.

item.title: Bholenath's Art | Valsan's Zany Hovel
item.description: Art is important to me, and I have always been producing something artistic since my late teens. Someday I will be a multimedia artist.
